foreignData.name: Oger-Schlachtmagierin
foreignData.text:
Erstschlag
Immer wenn die Oger-Schlachtmagierin angreift, kannst du eine Spontanzauber- oder Hexereikarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof wirken, indem du zusätzlich zu ihren anderen Kosten {R}{R} bezahlst. Falls jener Zauberspruch auf einen Friedhof gelegt würde, schicke ihn stattdessen ins Exil. Wenn du jenen Zauberspruch wirkst, erhält die Oger-Schlachtmagierin bis zum Ende des Zuges +X/+0, wobei X gleich dem Manabetrag des Zauberspruchs ist.

foreignData.name: Ogresa avivabatallas
foreignData.text:
Daña primero.
Siempre que la Ogresa avivabatallas ataque, puedes lanzar la carta de instantáneo o de conjuro objetivo desde tu cementerio pagando {R}{R} además de sus otros costes. Si ese hechizo fuera a ir a un cementerio, en vez de eso, exílialo. Cuando lances ese hechizo, la Ogresa avivabatallas obtiene +X/+0 hasta el final del turno, donde X es el valor de maná de ese hechizo.

foreignData.name: Lancebataille ogre
foreignData.text:
Initiative
À chaque fois que la Lancebataille ogre attaque, vous pouvez lancer une carte d'éphémère ou de rituel ciblée depuis votre cimetière en payant {R}{R} en plus de ses autres coûts. Si ce sort devait être mis dans un cimetière, exilez-le à la place. Quand vous lancez ce sort, la Lancebataille ogre gagne +X/+0 jusqu'à la fin du tour, X étant la valeur de mana de ce sort.

foreignData.name: Ogre Maga da Battaglia
foreignData.text:
Attacco improvviso
Ogniqualvolta l'Ogre Maga da Battaglia attacca, puoi lanciare una carta istantaneo o stregoneria bersaglio dal tuo cimitero pagando {R}{R} oltre ai suoi altri costi. Se quella magia sta per essere messa in un cimitero, invece esiliala. Quando lanci quella magia, l'Ogre Maga da Battaglia prende +X/+0 fino alla fine del turno, dove X è il valore di mana di quella magia.

foreignData.name: オーガの戦争術師
foreignData.text:
先制攻撃
オーガの戦争術師が攻撃するたび、あなたの墓地にありインスタントやソーサリーであるカード１枚を対象とする。あなたはそれを、それの他のコストに加えて{R}{R}を支払って唱えてもよい。その呪文が墓地に置かれるなら、代わりにそれを追放する。あなたがその呪文を唱えたとき、ターン終了時まで、オーガの戦争術師は＋Ｘ/＋０の修整を受ける。Ｘはその呪文のマナ総量に等しい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — オーガ・シャーマン

foreignData.name: 战咒食人魔
foreignData.text:
先攻
每当战咒食人魔攻击时，你可以从你的坟墓场中施放目标瞬间或法术牌，但在其他费用以外，还须额外支付{R}{R}。若该咒语将进入坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。当你施放该咒语时，战咒食人魔得+X/+0直到回合结束，X为该咒语的法术力值。

mainBoard.name: Ogre Battlecaster
mainBoard.originalText:
First strike
Whenever Ogre Battlecaster attacks, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard by paying {R}{R} in addition to its other costs. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead. When you cast that spell, Ogre Battlecaster gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that spell's mana value.

rulings.text: You must cast the spell as Ogre Battlecaster's triggered ability resolves. You can't wait and cast it later.

mainBoard.name: Chandra's Pyreling
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever a source you control deals noncombat damage to an opponent, Chandra's Pyreling gets +1/+0 and gains double strike until end of turn.

rulings.text: Combat damage is the damage that's dealt automatically by attacking and blocking creatures. Any other damage is noncombat damage, even if it's dealt during a combat phase by an attacking or blocking creature.

The ability of Chandra's Pyreling triggers just once per event for each opponent who is dealt noncombat damage by a source you control, regardless of how much damage that player is dealt. For example, if a sorcery you control deals 2 damage to each opponent in a four-player game, the ability will trigger three times.

mainBoard.text: Whenever a source you control deals noncombat damage to an opponent, Chandra's Pyreling gets +1/+0 and gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

mainBoard.name: Chandra's Spitfire
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Whenever an opponent is dealt noncombat damage, Chandra's Spitfire gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

rulings.text: Combat damage is the damage that’s dealt automatically by attacking and blocking creatures. Any other damage is noncombat damage, even if it’s dealt during a combat phase by an attacking or blocking creature.
In a multiplayer game, if a source deals damage to multiple opponents at the same time, the last ability of Chandra’s Spitfire will trigger as many times as there are opponents who were dealt damage.
The last ability of Chandra’s Spitfire triggers just once for each event in which an opponent is dealt noncombat damage, regardless of how much damage that player is dealt.

mainBoard.name: Thermo-Alchemist
mainBoard.originalText:
Defender
{T}: Thermo-Alchemist deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, untap Thermo-Alchemist.

rulings.text: In a Two-Headed Giant game, Thermo-Alchemist's activated ability causes the opposing team to lose 2 life.

Thermo-Alchemist's triggered ability resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered. Players can cast spells and activate abilities (such as Thermo-Alchemist's own activated ability) after the triggered ability resolves but before the spell that caused it to trigger does.

mainBoard.name: Wildfire Elemental
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever an opponent is dealt noncombat damage, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

rulings.text: Combat damage is the damage that’s dealt automatically by attacking and blocking creatures. Any other damage is noncombat damage, even if it’s dealt during a combat phase by an attacking or blocking creature.
In a multiplayer game, if a source deals damage to multiple opponents at the same time, the last ability of Wildfire Elemental will trigger that many times.
The last ability of Wildfire Elemental triggers once for each event in which an opponent is dealt noncombat damage, regardless of how much damage that player is dealt.
Wildfire Elemental’s triggered ability affects only creatures you control at the time it resolves. Creatures you begin to control later in the turn won’t get +1/+0.

mainBoard.name: Pillar of Flame
mainBoard.originalText: Pillar of Flame deals 2 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

rulings.text: A creature dealt damage by Pillar of Flame that dies this turn will be exiled even if it wasn’t the target of Pillar of Flame (because the damage was redirected somehow). If the target creature isn’t dealt damage (most likely because the damage was prevented), it won’t be exiled if it dies that turn.
A creature dealt damage by Pillar of Flame will be exiled no matter why the creature would die that turn. It could have its toughness reduced to 0 or less or be destroyed by another spell or ability.

mainBoard.text: Pillar of Flame deals 2 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

mainBoard.flavorText: Devils sow chaos and reap panic.

foreignData.flavorText: Teufel säen Chaos und ernten Panik.
foreignData.name: Tanz der Teufel
foreignData.text: Erzeuge zwei 1/1 rote Teufel-Kreaturenspielsteine. Sie haben „Wenn diese Kreatur stirbt, fügt sie einem Ziel deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu."

foreignData.flavorText: Los diablos siembran caos y cosechan pánico.
foreignData.name: Baile demoníaco
foreignData.text: Crea dos fichas de criatura Diablo rojas 1/1. Tienen "Cuando esta criatura muera, hace 1 punto de daño a cualquier objetivo".

foreignData.flavorText: Les diables sèment le chaos et récoltent la panique.
foreignData.name: Danse avec les diables
foreignData.text: Créez deux jetons de créature 1/1 rouge Diable. Ils ont « Quand cette créature meurt, elle inflige 1 blessure à n'importe quelle cible. »

foreignData.flavorText: I diavoli seminano caos e raccolgono panico.
foreignData.name: Danza con i Diavoli
foreignData.text: Crea due pedine creatura Diavolo 1/1 rosse. Hanno "Quando questa creatura muore, infligge 1 danno a un qualsiasi bersaglio".

foreignData.flavorText: 悪魔どもは混沌を蒔き、恐慌を収穫する。
foreignData.name: 悪魔と踊る
foreignData.text: 赤の１/１のデビル・クリーチャー・トークン２体を生成する。それらは「このクリーチャーが死亡したとき、クリーチャーやプレインズウォーカーやプレイヤーのうち１つを対象とする。これはそれに１点のダメージを与える。」を持つ。

foreignData.flavorText: 魔鬼播撒混乱，收获恐慌。
foreignData.name: 与魔共舞
foreignData.text: 派出两个1/1红色魔鬼衍生生物。它们具有「当此生物死去时，它对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。」

mainBoard.name: Dance with Devils
mainBoard.originalText: Create two 1/1 red Devil creature tokens. They have "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."
mainBoard.text: Create two 1/1 red Devil creature tokens. They have "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

foreignData.flavorText: „Ich werde gerade erst warm."
foreignData.name: Flammenpeitsche
foreignData.text: Die Flammenpeitsche fügt einem Ziel deiner Wahl 4 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignData.flavorText: "Únicamente estoy calentando".
foreignData.name: Latigazo ardiente
foreignData.text: El Latigazo ardiente hace 4 puntos de daño a cualquier objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: « C'est juste un échauffement. »
foreignData.name: Fouet de flamme
foreignData.text: Le Fouet de flamme inflige 4 blessures à n'importe quelle cible.

foreignData.flavorText: "Mi sto appena scaldando."
foreignData.name: Sferzata di Fiamma
foreignData.text: La Sferzata di Fiamma infligge 4 danni a un qualsiasi bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 「単なるウォーミングアップに過ぎないわ。」
foreignData.name: 炎の鞭打ち
foreignData.text: クリーチャーやプレインズウォーカーやプレイヤーのうち１つを対象とする。炎の鞭打ちはそれに４点のダメージを与える。

foreignData.flavorText: 「这只是热身而已。」
foreignData.name: 炎鞭飞舞
foreignData.text: 炎鞭飞舞对任意一个目标造成4点伤害。

mainBoard.name: Flame Lash
mainBoard.originalText: Flame Lash deals 4 damage to any target.
mainBoard.text: Flame Lash deals 4 damage to any target.

mainBoard.flavorText: In the hold of the *Heart of Kiran*, Chandra answered Dovin Baan's sabotage with an explosive retort.

foreignData.flavorText: Im Frachtraum der *Herz des Kiran* erwiderte Chandra Dovin Baans Sabotage auf explosive Weise.
foreignData.name: Hungrige Flammen
foreignData.text: Die Hungrigen Flammen fügen einer Kreatur deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte und einem Spieler oder Planeswalker deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignData.flavorText: En el centro del Corazón de Kiran**, Chandra correspondió al sabotaje de Dovin Baan con una respuesta explosiva.
foreignData.name: Llamas hambrientas
foreignData.text: Las Llamas hambrientas hacen 3 puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo y 2 puntos de daño al jugador o planeswalker objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: Dans la cale du *Cœur de Kiran*, Chandra apporta une réponse explosive au sabotage de Dovin Baàn.
foreignData.name: Flammes voraces
foreignData.text: Les Flammes voraces infligent 3 blessures à une créature ciblée et 2 blessures à une cible, créature ou planeswalker.

foreignData.flavorText: Nella stiva del *Cuore di Kiran*, Chandra reagì al sabotaggio di Dovin Baan con una replica esplosiva.
foreignData.name: Fiamme Fameliche
foreignData.text: Le Fiamme Fameliche infliggono 3 danni a una creatura bersaglio e 2 danni a un giocatore o a un planeswalker bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: *キランの真意*号の船倉で、チャンドラはドビン・バーンの妨害に爆炎で応えた。
foreignData.name: 飲み込む炎
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体と、プレイヤーやプレインズウォーカーのうち１つを対象とする。飲み込む炎は前者に３点、後者に２点のダメージを与える。

foreignData.flavorText: 面对在*基岚之心号*舱内意图下手破坏的多温班恩，茜卓还以火爆回击。
foreignData.name: 贪婪烈焰
foreignData.text: 贪婪烈焰对目标生物造成3点伤害，且对目标牌手或鹏洛客造成2点伤害。

mainBoard.name: Hungry Flames
mainBoard.originalText: Hungry Flames deals 3 damage to target creature and 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

rulings.text: You can’t cast Hungry Flames unless you target both a creature and a player. If one target is illegal as Hungry Flames resolves, the spell deals damage to the remaining legal target.

mainBoard.text: Hungry Flames deals 3 damage to target creature and 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Reality is always much duller and grayer than what your imagination can conjure."

foreignData.flavorText: „Die Realität ist immer viel trüber und grauer als das, was man sich vorstellen kann."
foreignData.name: Verlockung der Möglichkeiten
foreignData.text:
Wirf als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken, eine Karte ab.
Ziehe zwei Karten.

foreignData.flavorText: "La realidad siempre es mucho más aburrida y gris que lo que puede suceder en tu imaginación".
foreignData.name: Entusiasmo ante la posibilidad
foreignData.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, descarta una carta.
Roba dos cartas.

foreignData.flavorText: « La réalité est toujours bien plus terne et bien plus maussade que ce que l'imagination peut conjurer. »
foreignData.name: Frisson de probabilité
foreignData.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, défaussez-vous d'une carte.
Piochez deux cartes.

foreignData.flavorText: "La realtà è sempre molto più grigia e noiosa di quel che può creare l'immaginazione."
foreignData.name: Brivido della Possibilità
foreignData.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, scarta una carta.
Pesca due carte.

foreignData.flavorText: 「現実は想像の産物よりよっぽど地味でつまんないね。」
foreignData.name: 胸躍る可能性
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、カード１枚を捨てる。
カード２枚を引く。

foreignData.flavorText: 「现实永远比你想象的要阴晦黑暗得多。」
foreignData.name: 快意拼搏
foreignData.text:
弃一张牌，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。
抓两张牌。

mainBoard.name: Thrill of Possibility
mainBoard.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.

rulings.text: You must discard exactly one card to cast Thrill of Possibility; you can't cast it without discarding a card, and you can't discard additional cards.

mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.

mainBoard.flavorText: As eons passed, the rock wore away, revealing the rich colors at the mountain's heart.

foreignData.flavorText: Im Laufe der Äonen wurde der Fels abgetragen, sodass die satten Farben im Herzen des Gebirges sichtbar wurden.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Felsklippe
foreignData.text:
Die Gedeihende Felsklippe kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Sowie die Gedeihende Felsklippe ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Rot.
{T}: Erzeuge {R} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: A medida que pasaban los siglos, la roca se iba erosionando, revelando así los bellos colores del corazón de la montaña.
foreignData.name: Risco floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Risco floreciente entra al campo de batalla girado.
En cuanto el Risco floreciente entre al campo de batalla, elige un color que no sea rojo.
{T}: Agrega {R} o un maná del color elegido.

foreignData.flavorText: Au fil des éons, la pierre s'est érodée, révélant les couleurs vives du cœur de la montagne.
foreignData.name: Promontoire prospère
foreignData.text:
Le Promontoire prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
Au moment où le Promontoire prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez une couleur autre que le rouge.
{T} : Ajoutez {R} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: Col passare delle ere, la pietra si erose, rivelando i brillanti colori nel cuore della montagna.
foreignData.name: Falesia Florida
foreignData.text:
La Falesia Florida entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
Mentre la Falesia Florida entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli un colore diverso dal rosso.
{T}: Aggiungi {R} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 悠久の時を経て岩肌は削られ、山の中心の豊かな色彩が露わになった。
foreignData.name: 興隆する絶壁
foreignData.text:
興隆する絶壁はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
興隆する絶壁が戦場に出るに際し、赤でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{R} か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: 无数世代过去，石头磨损，显露出高山核心处的丰富颜色。
foreignData.name: 兴旺绝壁
foreignData.text:
兴旺绝壁须横置进战场。
于兴旺绝壁进战场时，选择一种红色以外的颜色。
{T}：加{R}或一点所选颜色的法术力。

mainBoard.name: Thriving Bluff
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
Thriving Bluff enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
